wikipediaPreview: The Science Party, known as Future Party until March 2016,[2] is an Australian political party established in 2013.[3]  Contents  1 Political philosophy  1.1 Policies   2 Party history 3 See also 4 References 5 External links   Political philosophy[edit] The Science Party believes that technological development is a positive force in human affairs[4] and values the cultural, economic and technological benefits of modernism. It believes in freedom of expression and has a positive view of the power of free markets and the benefits of high density cities...
